citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45p on
05-Jul-17.
Dr. Maginnis and ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and met with a licensee as they were leaving the property. They
had a previously scheduled appointment they could not change.
